lille1.car2014.durieux_toulet.ftp_server

Class FTPTransferSocketImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • lille1.car2014.durieux_toulet.ftp_server.FTPTransferSocketImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FTPTransferSocket

    public class FTPTransferSocketImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements FTPTransferSocket
    FTP Transfert Socket is used to read and write on data socket connection. The class support the active and passive FTP mode.
    Author:
    Durieux Thomas, Toulet Cyrille
